choose_best_education: By choosing us, you are choosing the best quality of education!
best_teachers_description: The university employs the most qualified teachers.
modern_university_description: The university is equipped with the most advanced equipment to consolidate study materials.
international_college_description: The International IT and Business College of 'Salymbekov University' is a new college with a modern infrastructure, aimed at training specialists with the latest curriculum in Russian and English.

rector.text: Salymbekov University, Lincoln University and INTI University of Malaysia invite applicants to the International College of IT and Business to acquire knowledge in programming.
rector.text2: The International College of IT and Business "Salymbekov University" is a new college with modern facilities, aimed at providing training in the latest curriculum in both Russian and English languages.
rector.text3: The best specialists from the International College of IT and Business "Salymbekov University", "Lincoln University" and "INTI International University" teach students.
rector.text4: Upon completion of the course, students will receive internationally recognized knowledge, two diplomas (Kyrgyz and international standards), and will have English proficiency at the TOEFL/IELTS level.
rector.text5: We accept applicants based on grades from 9th and 11th classes.

header.itcollege: International College of IT and Business
header.collegeInfo: International College of IT and Business “Salymbekov University” is a new college with modern facilities, aimed at training specialists in the latest training programs in Russian and English.
header.admissionsDetails: Our college accepts applicants from the 9th and 11th grades. Based on the 9th grade, you will study in Kyrgyzstan for 2 years and 1.5 years in Malaysia. Based on the 11th grade, you will study in Kyrgyzstan for 1 year and 1.5 years in Malaysia.
header.professionsInfo: Our college offers a total of 3 IT specialties! In each of them, you will be taught by professional teachers and mentors. You will already be studying in your 1st year!

about.title: Salymbekov University
about.subtitle: Computer Science & Multimedia
about.description: Salymbekov University and Lincoln University of Malaysia invite applicants to the International College of IT and Business to gain programming knowledge. The International College of IT and Business 'Salymbekov University' is a new college with a modern material and technical base, aimed at training specialists based on the latest educational programs in Russian and English. Students will be taught by the best specialists from the International College of IT and Business 'Salymbekov University' and 'Lincoln University'. Upon completion of their studies, students will acquire internationally recognized knowledge, two diplomas of Kyrgyz and international standards, and will possess English proficiency at the TOEFL/IELTS level.

header.title: Computer Science
header.description: Explore the exciting world of computer science by studying programming, artificial intelligence, databases, and much more.

about.title: About the Program
about.description: The 'Computer Science' program offers students an in-depth study of the theory and practice required to create innovative software solutions. Our goal is to prepare specialists capable of solving complex problems, developing software, and working in interdisciplinary teams.

list.name: Programming Fundamentals
list.description: Master the basic concepts of programming such as syntax, logic, and algorithms. Ideal for beginners.

list.name: Artificial Intelligence
list.description: Dive into AI and machine learning technologies. Learn how to create intelligent systems and applications.

list.name: Web Application Development
list.description: Learn how to create dynamic websites and applications using popular programming languages and frameworks.

list.name: Mobile Applications
list.description: Master application development for iOS and Android using modern technologies and methodologies.

list.name: Project: Smart Assistant
list.description: Students developed a smart assistant that uses AI to process requests and perform tasks.

list.name: Project: Task Management Web Application
list.description: A web application that helps users manage their tasks and projects with an intuitive interface.

list.name: Project: Fitness Mobile Application
list.description: A mobile application that helps users track their workouts and achievements.

admission.title: How to Apply
admission.description: To apply for the 'Computer Science' program, submit your application through our online portal. We welcome students of all backgrounds.

header.title: Mobile Development
header.description: Learn how to create mobile applications for iOS and Android using the latest technologies.

about.title: About the Profession
about.description: Mobile development is one of the most in-demand and rapidly growing fields in IT. With the rise in popularity of smartphones, tablets, and other mobile devices, the ability to create applications for iOS and Android becomes an essential skill for IT specialists.

list.name: Basics of Mobile Development
list.description: Learn the fundamental principles of mobile development for iOS and Android, and get acquainted with the tools needed to get started.

list.name: React Native Development
list.description: Master cross-platform mobile application development using the React Native framework.

list.name: iOS Development with Swift
list.description: Learn the Swift programming language and how to create native applications for iPhone and iPad.

list.name: Android Development with Kotlin
list.description: Learn Kotlin — the primary language for Android application development, and start creating your own projects.

list.name: Delivery Mobile Application
list.description: An application that helps users order food and goods with real-time delivery.

list.name: Fitness Tracker Application
list.description: A mobile application that tracks users' fitness activities and helps them achieve their sports goals.

list.name: Travel Application
list.description: A convenient application for planning trips and booking tickets.

admission.title: How to Apply
admission.description: Join our mobile development program and start your career in a high-tech and promising field. Apply online and start learning today!

header.title: Multimedia Programs
header.description: Explore the world of multimedia technologies! Programs that combine art and technology to create incredible visual and audiovisual projects.

about.title: About the Program
about.description1: Our multimedia technologies program offers an in-depth immersion into creating audiovisual materials, 3D modeling, animation, and more. The program enables students to master the tools that modern designers and animators use to create interactive media products.
about.description2: You will learn: the basics of design, working with video and audio, creating interactive applications, and using virtual and augmented reality technologies.

list.name: Design and Animation
list.description: Master the basics of graphic design and animation. Learn to create amazing 2D and 3D animations that capture attention.

list.name: Video Editing and Post-production
list.description: Learn how to edit videos, add visual effects, and work with editing software. Become a professional in creating videos for film and television.

list.name: Virtual Reality
list.description: Discover how to create content for virtual reality. Work with technologies that create a fully immersive experience.

list.name: Augmented Reality
list.description: Learn the principles of augmented reality and how to embed digital objects into the real world using modern tools.

list.name: Project: Virtual Tour
list.description: Students created a virtual tour of famous museums around the world using VR technology and interactive design.

list.name: Project: Animated Short Film
list.description: A creative team of students developed an animated film using 3D modeling and modern animation tools.

list.name: Project: Interactive Application
list.description: An application created by students uses augmented reality to enhance the learning process in schools.

admission.title: How to Apply
admission.description: To apply for the multimedia technologies program, submit your application through our online portal. We will review your creative works and conduct an interview.

header.title: HOW TO ENROLL IN IT and Business College AFTER 9TH GRADE?

steps.description: To enroll in Salymbekov University after 9th or 10th grade, the applicant must submit the following documents:
documents: original or duplicate certificate of secondary general education and accompanying documents;
completed application form for admission to Salymbekov University;

steps.description: After document submission, once registered on the KR Ministry of Education portal, we will send an admission confirmation and invite you to the college to sign the contract.
After the contract is signed, payment of the initial tuition fee or the total contract amount is required within 3 days.

cost.title: COST OF EDUCATION
cost.description: The cost of education for students admitted to Salymbekov University in the 2024-25 academic year is $3500 per year and will not change throughout the entire period of study.

contact.description: For more information about payment deadlines and forms, as well as possible discounts, please contact +996 (558) 658 518.

header.title: HOW TO ENROLL IN IT and Business College AFTER 11TH GRADE?

steps.description: To enroll in Salymbekov University after 11th grade, the applicant must submit the following documents:
documents: original or duplicate certificate of secondary general education and accompanying documents;
completed application form for admission to Salymbekov University;

steps.description: After document submission, once registered on the KR Ministry of Education portal, we will send an admission confirmation and invite you to the college to sign the contract.
After the contract is signed, payment of the initial tuition fee or the total contract amount is required within 3 days.

cost.title: COST OF EDUCATION
cost.description: The cost of education for students admitted to Salymbekov University in the 2024-25 academic year is $3500 per year and will not change throughout the entire period of study.

contact.description: For more information about payment deadlines and forms, as well as possible discounts, please contact +996 (558) 658 518.

Questions.question: 1. What programs does the college offer?
Questions.answer: The college offers three main IT training programs: software development, mobile application development (iOS, Android, Flutter), and multimedia application development (VFX design, Adobe Premiere Pro, etc.).

Questions.question: 2. How to apply for admission?
Questions.answer: To apply, you need to contact the admissions office by phone: +996 778 99 88 89 or +996 706 99 88 89, or send a request to info@salymbekov.com. Admission is available for students after 9th and 11th grades.

Questions.question: 3. Are there scholarship opportunities?
Questions.answer: The college has regular competitions that offer discounts of up to 100% for tuition. There is also an opportunity for our students to study free of charge for one semester programs in Malaysia and Korea. These programs allow students to study in foreign institutions, broadening their academic experience and cultural horizons.

Questions.question: 4. What employment opportunities does the college provide?
Questions.answer: The college collaborates with leading IT companies, and its instructors are practicing developers, ensuring practical training and increased employment opportunities for graduates.

Questions.question: 5. What is the tuition fee?
Questions.answer: Tuition fees depend on the selected program and conditions. For current information, it is recommended to contact the admissions office.

Questions.question: 6. What additional services does the college provide?
Questions.answer: The college offers English-language instruction, opening up opportunities for international cooperation and employment. Competitions and events are also organized to enhance students' professional skills.

Questions.question: 7. How does the college support the learning process?
Questions.answer: The education is conducted using modern programs and advanced technical facilities. The instructors are practicing professionals, ensuring the relevance and practical focus of the training.

Questions.question: 8. Can students study abroad?
Questions.answer: Yes, the dual diploma program includes studying in Kyrgyzstan and Malaysia. Students who finish 11th grade study for 1 year in Kyrgyzstan and 1.5 years in Malaysia; those who finish 9th grade study for 2 years in Kyrgyzstan and 1.5 years in Malaysia.

Questions.question: 9. How are students assessed?
Questions.answer: Information about the student assessment system is not provided on the official website. It is recommended to clarify the details with the admissions office or faculty.

Questions.question: 10. What languages can students learn at the college?
Questions.answer: The main languages of instruction are Russian and English. Special attention is paid to English language studies to achieve TOEFL/IELTS levels.

Questions.question: 11. How can students participate in the college's social life?
Questions.answer: The college organizes various contests and events aimed at developing students' professional and personal skills.

Questions.question: 12. How does the college help students develop leadership skills?
Questions.answer: The college conducts training and workshops focused on developing leadership qualities and personal growth.

Contacts.WelcomeMessage: Welcome to our university's website. Below are the contact details; we look forward to answering your questions.

intro.title: About Salymbekov College
intro.description: Our college is dedicated to providing a world-class education in IT and Business. We believe in the power of knowledge to shape the future.

mission.title: Our Mission & Values
mission.description: Education is not just about academic success, it’s about empowering individuals to innovate and make a difference. We aim to have a positive impact on society through knowledge.

publicMission.title: Public Mission
publicMission.description: Salymbekov College was founded with a mission to make education accessible for everyone, combining knowledge with community values and public service.

cards.title: Innovative Programs

cards.title: Community Impact
cards.description: Making a positive impact through community involvement.

videoSection.title: Discover the magic of Salymbekov College!

students.title: College Students of Salymbekov IT and Business
students.studentsOverview: At Salymbekov IT and Business College, talented and ambitious students strive for high achievements in IT and business.
achievementList: Organization of student conferences and events
Development of projects recognized at exhibitions
students.communityDescription: Our students actively participate in college life, creating various clubs and initiative groups.
students.quote1: "Studying at Salymbekov College opened many opportunities for me." - Anna, 2nd year student
students.quote2: "I am grateful for the support and development of my skills." - Sergey, 3rd year student

owner.title: Askar Salymbekov
owner.bio1: Askar Salymbekov is an outstanding educator, entrepreneur, and founder of Salymbekov College, one of the leading educational institutions in Kyrgyzstan. His career in education began over 15 years ago when he realized the need for quality training and specialists who meet modern market demands.
owner.bio2: In 2010, Askar Salymbekov founded Salymbekov College, which offers a variety of training programs in information technology, business, medicine, and humanities. The college has become known for its innovative teaching methods and high educational standards. Under Askar's leadership, the college constantly improves the learning process by attracting experienced teachers and implementing modern technologies.
owner.bio3: Askar actively supports initiatives to develop the educational system of Kyrgyzstan. He organizes various seminars and training sessions for educators, sharing his experience and knowledge. His vision and approach to education inspire students to succeed in their professional activities and contribute to the formation of a new generation of highly qualified specialists.
owner.bio4: In addition to educational activities, Askar Salymbekov is engaged in entrepreneurship and invests in social projects aimed at improving the quality of life in Kyrgyzstan. His multifaceted activities make him a significant figure not only in education but also in the country's business community.
owner.subtitle: Images of the College and Projects

director.title: Welcome to our International College of IT and Business
director.bio1: Welcome to our new college, the International College of IT and Business!
director.bio2: Transitions are never easy, whether it’s school, college, university, or any other practical stage of life.
director.bio3: As a teacher and a parent, I understand that these years are a very exciting time of the year when children enter new life paths, explore themselves, their talents, and their profession.
director.bio4: I believe in practicality, not rote memorization. I believe in people, not machines. I believe in learning, not grades. Since our university has met the expectations of students and parents in a short time, I assure you it will continue to do so in the future.
director.bio5: Our college trains IT specialists through a unique program in collaboration with Lincoln University Malaysia. We place special emphasis on advanced English language studies.
director.bio6: Only in our college can you earn a dual diploma: Kyrgyz and international standards.
director.bio7: It is a great honor for me to be part of this team. We are a family. We need to work as one team. It’s either us or no one. It’s all for one and one for all.
director.bio8: If you have ideas, suggestions, or problems, please come and discuss them. Communication is the key to any successful relationship, whether professional or personal. Please don’t hesitate to come up with new ideas, innovative methods, new societies, new programs, and new talents.
director.bio9: Above all, we are a team. We must do everything as a family. We want a safe future for OUR children. OUR children are OUR priority. We will make the impossible possible. We will see the invisible together. Welcome to our college!

student_council.title: Student Council of Salymbekov University
student_council.about_paragraph: The Student Council of the institution 'Salymbekov University' is a permanent student self-governance body. In its work, the Student Council is guided by the principles of democracy, voluntariness, equality, and legality. All students of 'Salymbekov University' have the right to elect and be elected to the Student Council and participate in its activities.
student_council.goals_title: Main Goals and Objectives of Student Self-Governance
student_council.goals_paragraph: The goal of the Student Council is to create conditions for:
student_council.goal_1: Optimizing the process of professional education for students of the University;
student_council.goal_2: The comprehensive development of a student's personality, with physical and moral-psychological health;
student_council.goal_3: Ensuring the implementation of students' rights to participate in the management of the educational process and solving important issues of student life.
student_council.task_1: Involving students in solving all issues related to the training of highly qualified specialists;
student_council.task_2: Developing proposals to improve the quality of the educational process, taking into account the scientific and professional interests of students;
student_council.task_3: Defending and representing the rights and interests of students;
student_council.task_4: Assisting in solving educational, socio-economic, and other issues affecting the interests of the University;
student_council.task_5: Supporting the University’s management bodies in solving educational and scientific tasks, organizing student leisure, and promoting a healthy lifestyle;
student_council.task_6: Assisting the University’s structural units in conducting events within the educational process;
student_council.task_7: Carrying out work aimed at raising students' awareness and their demands for the level of their knowledge, cultivating a respectful attitude toward the property complex, and fostering patriotism and respect for the spirit and traditions of the University;
student_council.task_8: Informing students about the activities of the University;
student_council.task_9: Supporting the implementation of socially significant youth initiatives.

admissioncommittee.title: Admission Committee
admissioncommittee.welcomeMessage: Salymbekov University is delighted to welcome you to the new academic year and is excited to open its doors for you. The university is a modern, innovative educational institution.
admissioncommittee.aboutMessage: Founded in 2019 as a continuation of the educational activities of the Askar Salymbekov Foundation, Salymbekov University is fully equipped to prepare qualified specialists.
admissioncommittee.extracurricularMessage: The university pays great attention to students' extracurricular activities. Students actively participate in the ENACTUS project, IT events, and Business School training sessions.

direction.heading: Training Directions
direction.college: International College of IT and Business

direction.program2.details: (Duration: 1 year 10 months, 2 years 10 months) Experimental Curriculum
direction.program3.details: (Duration: 1 year 10 months, 2 years 10 months) Experimental Curriculum

scholarships.social_support_description: Social support for university students is the provision of benefits in the form of reduced tuition fees, expressed as a percentage of the established tuition cost. Social support benefits may include: free dormitory accommodation, subsidized meals, etc. Benefits may also be provided as exceptions in other special cases, provided there are valid grounds deemed sufficient by the committee.
scholarships.social_support_condition: A mandatory condition for receiving social support is excellent or good academic performance, discipline, and active participation in scientific research, cultural, sports, and social activities at the university. Students of the full-time form of study who have achieved excellent grades in all subjects for the previous academic year and have no academic debts are eligible for benefits.
scholarships.category_i_description: Full-time students who have completed the academic year with excellent grades in all subjects.
scholarships.category_ii_description: Students who have lost their breadwinner, orphans, and persons with disabilities of groups I and II.
scholarships.category_iii_description: Students whose parents are full-time employees of the University and have made a significant contribution to the improvement of the quality of education, scientific research, and who actively participate in the university's public life.
scholarships.category_iv_description: Students who regularly represent the University in competitions and contests at the national, interregional, and international levels.
scholarships.category_v_description: Students entering the first year who have distinguished themselves in their studies at schools, vocational schools, and in various educational, sports, and cultural competitions at the national and international levels.
scholarships.commission_composition: Composition of the Commission for Student Social Support at the International Faculty of Medicine, 'Salymbekov University'

scholarships.basis_resolution: Basis: Decision of the Academic Council dated August 30, 2022.

tuition_info.title: Tuition Fees at Salymbekov University
tuition_info.description: Tuition fees at Salymbekov University are determined in accordance with the Charter, Strategic Goals and Objectives, Accounting Policy, internal documents, as well as the laws and regulations of the Kyrgyz Republic. In accordance with the decrees of higher state bodies, students of the university have the right to pay tuition fees in equal installments throughout the academic year.

courses.title: International College of IT and Business

documents.title: Required Documents for Admission
documents.citizensKG: For citizens of the Kyrgyz Republic:
documents.application: Application addressed to the rector of the institution 'Salymbekov University' (sample)
documents.educationDocument: State document of general secondary or vocational education (certificate or diploma)
documents.passportWithVisa: Passport with an entry visa in accordance with the legislation of the Kyrgyz Republic and its copy
documents.originalEducationDocument: Original document of complete secondary education with subjects and grades (points) and notarized copy
documents.notarizedTranslation: Notarized translation of the complete secondary education document into the official language of the Kyrgyz Republic
documents.educationEquivalence: Certificate from the Ministry of Education and Science of the Kyrgyz Republic on the equivalence of complete secondary education

admissionsRegulations.section1: Before the start of document submission, the admissions committee announces the following:
admissionsRegulations.section2: The main documents for admission for citizens of the Kyrgyz Republic are:
admissionsRegulations.section3: The main documents for admission for foreign citizens are:

goal_debateclub: The goal of the debate club is to develop critical thinking in students of Salymbekov University to solve various problems in professional activities and practical life situations. These are the skills that traditional educational programs cannot fully provide.
task_1: Educational, as they contribute to the consolidation, actualization of previously acquired knowledge, and the acquisition of new knowledge, skills, and abilities.
task_2: Developing, as they help develop intellectual, linguistic qualities, and creative abilities. Debates develop logic, critical thinking, and help form a systemic vision of the problem, the interconnection of events and phenomena, and various aspects of their consideration.
task_3: Educational, as they help form a culture of debate, tolerance, and recognition of the multiplicity of approaches to problem-solving.
task_4: Communicative, as the educational process takes place in interpersonal communication, and learning occurs through joint activities.
advantage_1: Forming critical speech thinking in learners.
advantage_2: Differentiation of the content of the educational material.
advantage_4: Variety of teaching forms and methods.
advantage_5: Forming generalized practical skills in learners.

tutor.description: Salymbekov University constantly supports mutual assistance and mutual help among students, especially senior students, ready to assist first-year students and younger students. The tutor movement is under the responsibility of the Student Council and is an important part of the educational and upbringing processes.
tutor.leaderName: Rahmankulova Minura - Chairwoman of the Student Council, Head of the Tutor Movement.

creativeterms.title: Creative Teams and Clubs at Salymbekov University
creativeterms.description: To strengthen educational, educational, and scientific activities, Salymbekov University offers students the opportunity to participate in creative teams and clubs according to their interests and desires.

instructions.title: Instructions and Regulations
instructions.header: Salymbekov University's resource bases and resources follow the instructions and regulations below in conducting educational and academic activities.
instructions.description: These regulations help ensure the efficiency of the educational process, improve educational standards, and maintain high-quality education. Taking into account changes in legislation and recommendations from the Ministry of Education, Salymbekov University continuously updates and adapts its methodological materials and instructions to provide students with up-to-date information.

sections.title: eBilim Information System
sections.description: The eBilim Information System is an educational platform for students of the International Faculty of Medicine to fully manage the educational process, conduct modules, and exams online. The portal allows adding workload, editing, adding, and deleting students and teachers, electronic gradebooks, schedules, and an electronic library. All interface elements are translated into three languages: Kyrgyz, Russian, and English.

sections.title: Edu.salymbekov.com Information System
sections.description: The Edu.salymbekov.com Information System is an educational platform for students of the International College of IT and Business, adapted for the college's educational process and activities, enabling the full conduct of modules, exams, and the placement of information about educational activities.

sections.title: Lincoln University College Information System
sections.description: The Lincoln University College Information System is an educational portal of the partner university Lincoln University College, providing students of the college the opportunity to participate in a joint educational process, access the electronic library, and resources.

educationalResources.title: Educational Resources
educationalResources.intro: The Salymbekov University scientific library includes comprehensive paper and electronic resources, catalogs, electronic journals, and databases to support the development and provision of educational, training, and research resources for students and faculty through all forms and methods of library and information activities. The library is one of the significant structural divisions of the university, responsible for educational and research processes and offering the following resources:

resources.title: KNOX
resources.description: Students also have access to the KNOX educational portal, which offers a wide range of educational and research resources in the fields of medicine, IT, and business.

resources.title: Research4Life Portal
resources.description: The Research4Life portal from the World Health Organization provides full access to electronic publications, journals, and libraries in medicine, IT, architecture, and agriculture for training well-rounded specialists.

resources.title: SAGE Publishing Portal
resources.description: The SAGE Publishing portal is one of the world's largest publishers, releasing over 1,000 journals and books monthly on medical, humanitarian, and natural science topics.

resources.title: DeGruyter Portal
resources.description: The DeGruyter portal, one of the largest European publishers, includes a database of 210 journals on academic and humanities topics.

resources.title: Lincoln University College Portal
resources.description: The Lincoln University College portal, one of the top universities in Malaysia and a partner of our university, provides access to its databases (books, journals, monographs) in key areas such as medicine, business, IT, and healthcare.

resources.title: EBSCO Publishing Portal
resources.description: The EBSCO Publishing portal is the largest provider of scientific resources from leading global publishers, offering access to 15 thematic databases in medicine, IT, business, and management.

resources.title: JetiHub
resources.description: YouTube-канал JetiHub, созданный по инициативе колледжа, служит дополнительным образовательным ресурсом, дополняя основную учебу. Он предоставляет студентам возможность обсуждать идеи и задавать вопросы в комментариях, создавая активное сообщество для обмена опытом. Видеоуроки основаны на программах обучения, таких как Computer Science, Multimedia Application и Mobile Computing. Они помогают студентам повторять и закреплять изученные темы в удобном формате — в любое время и в любом месте

socialsupport.title: Student Social Support Commission
socialsupport.description: The regulation is developed based on the Charter of the institution 'Salymbekov University' (hereinafter referred to as the University), the Kyrgyz Republic Law 'On Education', and other regulatory legal acts governing the activities of higher professional educational institutions.
socialsupport.purpose: This regulation is developed for the purpose of providing social support to students and strengthening their motivation to achieve high educational results.
socialsupport.benefits: Student social support represents the provision of benefits to students in the form of a reduction in tuition fees, expressed as a percentage of the established tuition fee.
socialsupport.types_of_benefits: Social support benefits can be provided in the form of: free accommodation in the dormitory, discounted meals, and others.
socialsupport.support_decision: The University provides social support to students and grants them benefits for tuition fees based on the decision of a special commission created and headed by the president of the University.
socialsupport.approval_process: All forms of social support, including benefits for tuition fees, are reviewed by a special commission and presented for approval by the founders of the University.
socialsupport.financial_criteria: The procedure, types, and amounts of social support provided to students of the University are determined independently based on the financial capabilities of the University.
socialsupport.deferral_option: Social support may be provided to students of the University in the form of a deferral or installment plan for tuition payments based on the recommendations of department heads and the absence of academic or financial arrears from previous semesters.

physchohelp.title: Psychological Support for Students
physchohelp.content: In order to create a favorable and comfortable atmosphere in the educational institution for students, Salymbekov University provides support and assistance to students at all levels: educational work, mentorship, guidance, psychological and social support. To adapt to new socio-cultural conditions when enrolling and studying at the university, a specially designed adaptation program exists. Within the framework of this adaptation program, qualified psychological assistance is provided by the following specialists:

studentservice.title: Student Social Support Commission
studentservice.content: The main goal of the Student Service Center is to provide information regarding academic results (certificates, transcripts). All information is securely stored in the Ebilim Information System, and upon request, the head of the student department provides information according to the students' requirements.

teacher.name: Asina Toktosunovna Bopushova
teacher.position: Head of the Student Personnel Department (SPD)

content.heading: Get familiar with the adaptation program:

selectionSchedule.title: Selection and Enrollment Schedule
selectionSchedule.description: Salymbekov University follows a policy of selecting and enrolling applicants in strict accordance with the norms and rules of the Ministry of Education and Science of the Kyrgyz Republic, which annually forms and publishes the schedule of selection rounds.
selectionSchedule.subtitle: Schedule of selection and enrollment rounds for applicants for the 2024-2025 academic year

dates.registrationStart: Registration of applicants for the competition
dates.registrationEnd: Completion of registration for the competition
